entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
